paymentMethods.question: What payment methods are available for our IPTV subscription?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept PayPal and debit/credit cards through a secure payment gateway with automatic currency conversion and no hidden fees.

twoDevices.question: Can I use two devices at the same time with a single IPTV subscription?
twoDevices.answer: Yes, you can watch on two screens simultaneously with the 2 connections offer through IPTV Smarters Pro or Smarters Lite Player.

bandwidth.question: How much bandwidth does IPTV streaming consume?
bandwidth.answer: Our IPTV streams use the latest H.264 technology, which offers the best compression and image quality. The average size of an IPTV stream is around 8 Mbps. However, when changing channels, the H.264 protocol can have a momentary peak to start displaying the image. For this reason, a minimum internet speed of 16 Mbps is required, and 30 Mbps is recommended for HD channels.

devicesSupported.question: What types of devices are supported?
devicesSupported.answer: An IPTV Smarters Pro subscription is compatible with various devices such as MAG, Android smartphones, Android boxes, Enigma, DreamBox, Vu+ (...), PC, VLC, Kodi/XBMC (...), Smart TV.

satellite.question: Do I need satellite to use IPTV?
satellite.answer: No satellite equipment or dish antenna is needed. Connection to Smarters Pro servers is made through the internet.

advantages.question: What are the advantages of IPTV?
advantages.answer: IPTV (Internet Protocol Television) offers several advantages. It represents a promising and highly profitable market that is valued by numerous telecommunications providers. In addition, IPTV allows the creation of new positive and profitable services that can generate additional revenue.

fundamentals.question: What are the fundamentals of the IPTV system?
fundamentals.answer: Two basic IPTV systems: content broadcast to multiple users simultaneously (live broadcast) or used for Video On Demand (VOD), where content is delivered individually to the subscriber who requested it. The system depends on a decoder (set-top box) and other essential components.

whatIsIptv.question: What is IPTV?
whatIsIptv.answer: IPTV is Internet Protocol Television, highlighting its impact, its origin from the use of the Internet Protocol, and its probable use in synchronization with telecommunications where broadband connections are widespread. Any service that provides data in packets can be used.

supportResponse.question: Response time for technical support tickets?
supportResponse.answer: When sending a ticket for account activation or technical support, you will receive a response within 30 minutes to 1 hour, with the goal of responding within the first hour. During peak hours, response time may extend up to 2 hours.

smartTvChannels.question: I downloaded the channel list, but the channels don't work on my Smart TV
smartTvChannels.answer: Please make sure your channel list works by testing it with IPTV Smarters Pro or another IPTV application on a PC. If it still doesn't work, don't hesitate to contact us via WhatsApp.

vlcSiptrv.question: Do channels work in the VLC player, but don't work in the SiPTV app?
vlcSiptrv.answer: If you have TVs with webOS or Tizen and your streams are multicast, you must enable the UDP to HTTP function in the app settings and configure it on your router. IPTV SMARTERS PRO Subscription

androidTvBox.question: Can an Android TV Box device convert my TV into a Smart TV?
androidTvBox.answer: The answer is yes. In fact, you will have access to all kinds of Google Play Store applications for Android. This turns your TV into an interactive device. You can use applications like Gmail, Firefox, Skype and many others directly from your TV. IPTV SMARTERS PRO Subscription

wifiEthernet.question: Wi-Fi or Ethernet?
wifiEthernet.answer: We always recommend connecting the device by cable (Ethernet).

androidTvBoxInstall.question: What is an Android TV Box and how to use it to install IPTV Smarters Pro?
androidTvBoxInstall.answer: An Android TV Box is an Android system device that converts your TV into a Smart TV, allowing you to install applications like IPTV Smarters Pro or Smarters Player Lite or ibo player. IPTV Smarters Pro Installation: 1. Connect the box to your TV and make sure it's connected to the internet. 2. Install IPTV Smarters Pro from Google Play Store. 3. Open the app, add a user and enter your IPTV credentials. 4. Enjoy streaming your IPTV channels! Install IPTV Smarters Pro or Smarters Player Lite (via Google Play Store) right now and start enjoying.

freeTrial.question: Do you offer a free trial?
freeTrial.answer: Yes, we offer a 24-hour free trial that gives you full access to all channels, movies and series available in your IPTV subscription.

installation.title: IPTV Smarters Pro APK / Smarters Player Lite App Installation Guide
installation.subtitle: How to install IPTV Smarters Pro on your device
installation.description: Follow our simple installation guides to get started with IPTV on your preferred device.
installation.introTitle: Looking for a reliable app to watch live TV, movies, series, and channels from around the world?
installation.introDescription: Download IPTV Smarters Pro APK (2025) and turn your device into a true entertainment platform. This app is designed for users with an IPTV Subscription and offers a smooth and user-friendly streaming experience.
installation.whatIsDescription: IPTV Smarters is a media player application that allows users to stream IPTV content from their subscription provider. The app does not provide any content by itself, but it allows you to connect to your IPTV subscription via an Xtream Codes API, an M3U link, or a playlist file.
installation.whyChooseSubtitle: Here are some advantages that make IPTV Smarters one of the best IPTV applications in 2025:
installation.benefit1Description: Simple navigation for all user profiles.
installation.benefit2Description: Supports Xtream Codes credentials, M3U links, and local files.
installation.benefit3Description: Access to program schedules and show times.
installation.benefit4Description: Enjoy your channels in HD, Full HD or 4K depending on your subscription.
installation.benefit5Description: Watch different content on multiple devices simultaneously.
installation.benefit6Description: Secure access to children's content and resume where you left off.

installation.smartTvDescription: IPTV smarters is an amazing video streaming player developed especially for end users who want to have the ability to watch live TV, VOD, series and TV catch-ups on their smart TV. This video player app is easy to use and yet very efficient with a powerful player, attractive and very impressive layout and above all user-friendly.
installation.smartTvSamsungStep1: Press the Smart Hub button on your remote control.
installation.smartTvSamsungStep2: search for IPTV Smarters Pro to install.

installation.appleIosStep1Content: Start by downloading the IPTV Smarters app from the Apple Store via this URL:
installation.appleIosStep1Search: or you can search for it on the App Store
installation.appleIosStep1Install: install the application on your iOS device.
installation.appleIosStep2Content: Enter the connection information we provided you after obtaining an IPTV SUBSCRIPTION with us.
installation.appleIosStep2Button: Now click on Â« ADD USER Â» to proceed to the next section.
installation.appleIosStep4Content: Now click on the Â« Live TV Â» icon as shown in the image via a red arrow.
installation.appleIosStep5Content: You must now select the channel group you want to watch and proceed to the next section.
installation.appleIosStep6Content: You must now click on the channel name, then double-click on the small screen to go full screen as the final step.
installation.appleIosStep7Content: To add EPG, no need to add a URL. Simply click on Â« Install EPG Â». Done.

This video player app is easy to use and yet very efficient with a powerful player, attractive and very impressive layout and above all user-friendly.
installation.windowsStep1Content: Go to the search engine and type Â« IPTV Smarters Pro Â».
installation.windowsStep3Content: Download the new version of IPTV Smarters Pro.
installation.windowsStep4Content: Once the file download is complete, click on the executable file
installation.windowsStep5Content: Windows will ask for permission to open this file. Select Â« Yes Â».
installation.windowsStep6Content: The file will now begin its installation. This should take between 1 and two minutes.
installation.windowsStep7Content: Once the installation is complete, start the IPTV Smarters program. Click on Â« Add a new user Â» and select Â« Connection with Xtream Codes API Â». Enter your credentials (username, password and portal URL) for your IPTV service.
installation.windowsStep8Content: You are now ready to start watching content on IPTV Smarters Pro !
installation.firestickTitle: Install IPTV Smarters Pro on FireStick, Android and iOS
installation.firestickIntro: In our tutorial, you will learn how to install IPTV Smarters on Firestick (also Fire TV Stick Lite, Fire TV Cube and Firestick 4K). I have also provided instructions to install IPTV Smarters on Android.
installation.firestickHowToInstallTitle: How to install IPTV Smarters Pro on Firestick
installation.firestickHowToInstallContent: Even though iptv smarters pro is listed on Google Play Store and Apple App Store for Android and iOS mobile devices respectively, Amazon Store does not host it. therefore, if you want it on your Firestick, you will have to download it laterally. we will download the iptv smarters apk using the downloader application.
installation.firestickDownloadAppIntro: we will first install the downloader application. This application will help you download IPTV more intelligently on Firestick (because browser downloads are not allowed).
installation.firestickStep2Content: click on the Search option > Search on the Firestick home screen
installation.firestickStep3Content: Type the name of the application (which is the downloader), click on the download option when it appears in the search results, choose the downloader icon on the next screen and download and install the application
installation.firestickStep4Content: return to the Firestick home screen after installing the downloader application in the menu bar, click on settings
installation.firestickStep5Content: in settings, choose the my fire tv option
installation.firestickStep6Content: When the following set of options appears on the next screen, click on Developer Options
installation.firestickStep7Content: Click on Install from unknown applications
installation.firestickStep8Content: Click on the downloader to activate the status with this, you have configured the Firestick settings to allow the installation of IPTV Smarters and other third-party applications. Follow the steps below:
installation.firestickStep9Content: You can now open the downloader application when you run this application for the first time, a set of prompts will appear. Ignore them until you see the next screen on this screen, you must click on the URL text box on the right side (make sure the home option in the left menu is selected) where it says Â« http:// Â»
installation.firestickStep10Content: Go ahead and enter the following path in this window: https://www.firesticktricks.com/smarter Note: you can also use the shortened version of the URL firesticktricks.com/smarter click on Go
installation.firestickStep11Content: wait a minute or two until iptv smarter is downloaded to your Firestick device
installation.firestickStep12Content: once the download is complete, the downloader application will run the apk file and the installation will start click on install
installation.firestickStep13Content: wait for the installation to complete
installation.firestickStep14Content: installation is complete with the application installation notification you can now choose to click on Open and start with IPTV Smarters I recommend choosing done so you can first delete the apk file and save space on Firestick storage
installation.firestickStep15Content: If you clicked Done above, you will be back on the downloader interface click on delete
installation.firestickStep16Content: click on delete again Great! You now have the IPTV Smarters application on Firestick.
installation.firestickHowToUseTitle: How to use IPTV Smarters on Firestick?
installation.firestickHowToUseContent: As I mentioned earlier, IPTV Smarters does not have its own channels. It's just a facilitator that allows you to stream the channels you have access to via the IPTV service provider in France. Therefore, to use iptv smarters, you must be subscribed to our service:
installation.firestickTermsTitle: When you run the iptv smarters application for the first time, the terms of use will be the first window. Scroll down and click Accept
installation.firestickAddUserTitle: This is the window you land on next. You must start by clicking either Add user in the top right corner, or Add new user in the middle of the screen
installation.firestickTwoWaysTitle: there are two ways to connect to your IPTV service on IPTV Smarters load your playlist or file/url connect with xtream codes API Here's what we'll send you after you register with us
installation.firestickLoadPlaylistContent: Your IPTV service must support the m3u playlist for you to be able to use it with IPTV smarters. Not all IPTV services do this. Generally, the IPTV service provider sends you an email with the connection information once you have successfully purchased their subscription plan. This email also contains the m3u playlist and epg links. If you have not received the links, you can contact the IPTV provider. When you choose the option to load your playlist or file/URL, the application may ask you for permission. Click Authorize
installation.firestickPlaylistScreenContent: here is the screen where you can enter the m3u playlist link. make sure to choose the m3u url radio button in the playlist type section in the playlist name section, enter the name of your choice in the file/url section, type the m3u url click the Add user button
installation.firestickAccessTitle: How to access IPTV Smarters on Firestick
installation.firestickAccessContent: This section is for users who want to know how to access IPTV smarters or other applications installed on Firestick. On the Firestick home screen, you will find the Your Apps and Channels section in the second row from which you can access up to 20 installed applications. If you have more than 20 applications, here are some ways to access them all: â€“ go to settings >> applications >> manage installed applications >> iptv smarters (or any other installed application) >> launch application or â€“ on your firestick remote, hold the home button for at least 5 seconds. in the popup window, click on applications or â€“ on the firestick home screen, click on the 3-dot button in the middle right
installation.firestickAccessScrollContent: When this application list appears, scroll down and click on iptv smarters
installation.firestickMoveHomeContent: If you think you will access IPTV Smarters frequently, move it to the home screen. Press the Menu button on the remote (3-line button). Click Move to front in the context menu at the bottom right.
installation.firestickClosingMessage: You are now ready to enjoy your IPTV subscription on FireStick! If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to contact us via WhatsApp.
